field.label: Enable Defguard Gateway
field.help: Check to enable Defguard Gateway service.

field.label: Defguard VPN Location Auth Token
field.help: Required: Token obtained from Defguard Core after network creation.

field.label: Defguard Core gRPC URL
field.help: Required: URL of Defguard Core's gRPC service.

field.label: Path to custom SSL CA cerficiate
field.help: Required if custom SSL CA has been enabled in Defguard Core; more details here: https://docs.defguard.net/admin-and-features/setting-up-your-instance/grpc-ssl-communication#custom-ssl-ca-and-certificates.

field.label: Gateway name
field.help: Name that will be displayed in Defguard

field.label: PID file
field.help: Optional: write PID to this file.

field.label: Stats gathering period
field.help: Specify the stats period in seconds

field.label: Use WireGuard userspace implementation
field.help: Use userspace WireGuard implementation; useful on systems without native WireGuard support.

field.label: Pre up
field.help: Command to run before bringing up the interface.

field.label: Pre down
field.help: Command to run before bringing down the interface.

field.label: Post up
field.help: Command to run after bringing up the interface.

field.label: Post down
field.help: Command to run after bringing down the interface.
